enableDualIFE=FALSE
maxRAWSizes=3
multiCameraEnable=TRUE
multiCameraEnableFront=TRUE
numMetadataResults=1

# the following settings disable per-frame log messages
# default is 0x1c080 (CORE + FORMAT + MEMSPY + HAL). Disable CORE & HAL.
logInfoMask=0x0c000

# default is 0xffffffff (all enabled). Disable CORE & HAL.
logWarningMask=0xfffeff7f
logConfigMask=0xfffeff7f

# disable [REQMAP] messages
logRequestMapping=FALSE

# set CHIUSECASE levels to only ERROR and WARN
overrideLogLevels=0x3

numPCRsBeforeStreamOn=1

# disable NCS service (needed for EIS, which we don't use)
enableNCSService=FALSE
